oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invasive plant species and the consequences of its prevalence in biodiversity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shuvar, Ivan
Korpita, Hanna
Shuvar, Antin
Shuvar, Bogdan
Kropyvnytskyi, Ruslan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: biodiversity
invasive plant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The problem of weed control has been facing mankind since the beginning of agricultural development, and is especially relevant today. In recent decades, the problem of invasion of rare plant species in Ukraine has been growing. Surveying areas, developing and implementing measures to prevent the destructive effects of biodiversity should be a priority for the preservation of natural ecosystems and environmental protection.
